name: Emerald Frothism 2025
description:
Emerald Frothism 2025.

The time is March 2025. 

You have been assigned to team up with VP Barber. Your name is Tekk Froth Vice Duke. Your mission is to deliver 10 comic books to Africa.  However, don't forget about Crone 6900. Our enemigo is not keen on you trying to have your way.  Created by Sa Larry Tavtekka.

Movement = arrow keys

Jump = Up arrow
